attributes.action: New treason law where committing crimes of disloyalty with intent to harm UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Under new treason Law :

Stripped of British citizenships 
British passport / driving license 
N.I number.
No re-entry to the UK. 
No jail in the UK. 
Banned completely for life, to ensure the contued safety of the British population.
attributes.background: High treason is the crime of disloyalty to the Crown. ... The last treason trial was that of William Joyce, "Lord Haw-Haw", who was executed by hanging in 1946. Since the Crime and Disorder Act 1998 became law, the maximum sentence for treason in the UK has been life imprisonment.
